about_the_game:
Friends. Romans. Countryfolk. CYBORGS!
The fall of Rome never came to pass.
Chariot races and gladiator fights abound, and the coliseum has become the default building on the streets of the world. Blood sport is the sole reason for the living, to beat up your fellow Romans to a pulp with enhanced limbs and senses.

Can you make it to the final boss and emerge victorious?

Gameplay
Gladiate is a spectacle fighter card game, where its not about how fast you win, its about how cool you look doing it.
Choose your deck and compete against mighty enemies for the adoration of the crowd, and maybe even a thumbs up from emperor Cybigula himself!



Key Features
  • 6 Unique playable decks with high score saved for each.
  • 27 Unique cards to delight and destroy with
  • 19 combos to dazzle the crowd
  • 4 card classes
  • 7 battles to fight through
  • Custom music tracks to get stuck in your head.
  • Day night cycle
  • 1 Bossy Boi

About Gladiate
This is the first project from Teicsoft. A bunch of friends who decided to set themselves the task of making a game from scratch, in a month, with little to no experience. A whole lot was learned, skills we didn't know we had were found, and we hit our deadline to be able to present gladiate to you!

short_description: Play with 6 unique decks and fight your way through a gauntlet of foes. Not only do you need to fight to survive, but also pull off combos to maximize your spectacle points and please the crowd. Can you make it to the final boss and emerge victorious?
